alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northeastern Hartford and south central Hampden Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enfield, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Enfield, Agawam, West Springfield, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Wilbraham, Windsor Locks, Somers and East Windsor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
